answers.answer: That sounds exactly like preeclampsia. Be careful.
They said it's not because they don't diagnose it till after 20 weeks but that's bs because you can in fact have it before 20 weeks. I'm in so much pain & don't know what to do :(

question: I went to the hospital yesterday for severe headache blurred vision & dizziness (all at rest - gets worse with activity). My bp was up to 120/83 then dropped to 80/60 then went back go my norm 100/60. My last record of high bp was 140/90 a couple weeks ago.  The doc wasn't concerned even with the protein in my urine. I was ordered an MRI and panicked so ended up with a ct. Ct was clear. The headache doesn't even go away with narcotics administered through iv at the hospital. I went at 3 pm yesterday got  home at 6 am today. They didn't even do blood work. I have an apt with my ob Thursday, but still having the headaches dizziness and vision disturbances. I would have went to him but hE is out of the country until Monday. My ob wants to keep an eye on my protein because I have never had it before. Do u think he will be concerned because the ct was clear? Does this sound like the onset of preeclampsia?
title: Help. Don't know what to do.
